verses.verse: <S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the trespass offering. <S%H817><s%> It is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

In the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the trespass offering; <S%H817><s%> and its blood <S%H1818><s%> he shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
He shall offer <S%H7126><s%> all of its fat: <S%H2459><s%> the fat tail, <S%H451><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the innards, <S%H7130><s%>

and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, <S%H3689><s%> which is by the loins, and the cover <S%H3508><s%> on the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> shall he take away; <S%H5493><s%>

Every male <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> of it. <S%H398><s%> It shall be eaten in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%> It is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6918><s%>

<S%H2403><s%>"'As is the sin offering, so is the trespass offering; <S%H817><s%> there is one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for them. <S%H3548><s%> The priest who makes atonement with them shall have it. <S%H3722><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> who offers <S%H7126><s%> any man <S%H376><s%>'s burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> even the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have for himself the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> which he has offered. <S%H7126><s%>

Every meal offering <S%H4503><s%> that is baked <S%H644><s%> in the oven, <S%H8574><s%> and all that is dressed <S%H6213><s%> in the pan, <S%H4227><s%> and on the griddle, <S%H4227><s%> shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s who offers it. <S%H7126><s%>

Every meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> or dry, <S%H2720><s%> belongs to all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> one <S%H376><s%> as well as another. <S%H251><s%>
<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> which one shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

If he offers <S%H7126><s%> it for a thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and cakes <S%H2471><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

With cakes <S%H2471><s%> of leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> for thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%>

Of it he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of each <S%H259><s%> offering <S%H7133><s%> for a heave offering <S%H7133><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> It shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s who sprinkles the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

The flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of his offering. <S%H7133><s%> He shall not leave <S%H3240><s%> any of it until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

<S%H2077><s%>"'But if the sacrifice of his offering <S%H7133><s%> is a vow, <S%H5088><s%> or a freewill offering, <S%H5071><s%> it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that he offers <S%H7126><s%> his sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> and on the next day <S%H4283><s%> what remains <S%H3498><s%> of it shall be eaten: <S%H398><s%>
but what remains <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

If any of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> is eaten <S%H398><s%> on <S%H398><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it will not be accepted, <S%H7521><s%> neither shall it be imputed <S%H2803><s%> to him who offers <S%H7126><s%> it. <S%H6292><s%> It will be an abomination, and the soul <S%H5315><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> any of it will bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

<S%H1320><s%>"'The flesh that touches <S%H5060><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing shall not be eaten. <S%H398><s%> It shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%> As for the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> everyone who is clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat it; <S%H398><s%>

but the soul <S%H5315><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> that belongs to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> on him, <S%H5315><s%> that soul shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

When anyone <S%H5315><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing, <S%H2932><s%> the uncleanness of man, <S%H120><s%> or an unclean <S%H2932><s%> animal, <S%H929><s%> or any unclean <S%H2931><s%> abomination, <S%H8263><s%> and eats <S%H398><s%> some of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> which belong to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no fat, <S%H2459><s%> of bull, <S%H7794><s%> or sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or goat. <S%H5795><s%>

The fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which dies of itself, <S%H5038><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which is torn of animals, <S%H2966><s%> may be used <S%H6213><s%> for any other service, <S%H4399><s%> but you shall in no way <S%H398><s%> eat of it. <S%H398><s%>

For whoever eats <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the animal, <S%H929><s%> of which men offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> even the soul <S%H5315><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>
You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> any blood, <S%H1818><s%> whether it is of bird <S%H5775><s%> or of animal, <S%H929><s%> in any of your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>
Whoever <S%H5315><s%> it is who eats <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7126><s%> 'He who offers the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> out of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

With his own hands <S%H3027><s%> he shall bring <S%H935><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire. <S%H801><s%> He shall bring <S%H935><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> with the breast, <S%H2373><s%> that the breast <S%H2373><s%> may be waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> but the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>'.

The right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> for a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

He among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> who offers <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and the fat, <S%H2459><s%> shall have the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> for a portion. <S%H4490><s%>

For the waved <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and the heaved <S%H8641><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> I have taken <S%H3947><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> them to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> as their portion <S%H2706><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>'"

This is the anointing <S%H4888><s%> portion of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> portion of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> out of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, <S%H801><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he presented <S%H7126><s%> them to minister to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office;
